website_summaries.verdict: A traditional upright vacuum that is powerful and durable without all the bells and whistles.
pros: 50-foot reinforced power cord won't fray or bend
Powerful motor and suction at seven amps
Disposable bags can be bought online or in stores
cons: At nearly 22 pounds, this is a heavy vacuum

customer_reviews.title: Excited to Vaccume now, Love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: This Sanitaire Vaccume has so much suction. I wanted one with no attachments. It makes it so easy to go under furniture and I like the 12" width because it will go between dining chair legs. It's so easy to use and the handle lays flat so you can get under furniture.Also liked that you don't have to replace the whole roller brush after with yrs. of use. You can order the brushes and slide them into the roller bar for upkeep after they wear down.The power cord is so long I can plug in and vacuum my 1800 sq feet home and more with only 1 plug in.Just love it! And my husband Agrees.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Eris

customer_reviews.title: Sweet. After replacing cheap vacuums like every few months
customer_reviews.text: Sweet. After replacing cheap vacuums like every few months, I decided to spring for the real McCoy. Has been holding up well, and vacuums well without all the expense of add on filters. Just be certain you install the belt correctly, if reversed, the brushes will rotate the wrong way and stress the unit. Easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum
customer_reviews.text: These Sanitare vacuums are pretty much unstoppable, I bought mine for everything from dirt and sand all the way to my Great Pyrenees puppy, this vacuum picks up everything with ease. And for people who say this vacuum is to heavy than there wrong. My younger sister who is half the size of me picks this vacuum up with no issue. If your looking for a heavy duty commercial vacuum than look no further than this.
customer_reviews.author: Donavon

customer_reviews.title: Beats my dyson
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value works better than any other vac I’ve owned including my dyson
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: these are the best I had
customer_reviews.text: I have my own business and I started with one of these Commercial Vacuum, and it was time to get another one. Thank you, these are the best I had, so far.01/08/2016, I just start using my Commercial Vacuum and have notice that the Vacuum Cleaner is real loud. I don't know why, but I'm going to take it to the shop to see why this Vacuum Cleaner is so loud. I will return, to insert the reason.
customer_reviews.author: Regina DeQuier

customer_reviews.title: Great for wall to wall carpet
customer_reviews.text: Does one thing does it well. First time I used it it pulled up quite a bit of heavy fine grit. The grooming is okay but not quite as defined as other vacuums with stiffer brushrolls, that said, should do quite well with softer rugs. Hood gets quite hot with extended use. Long cord has been a dream. Disposable bag is of the fleece HEPA type. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One has to be really strong to use this vac
customer_reviews.text: I had to trade this vacuum in on the lighter weight one. My cleaning lady complained about it and I was afraid she would quit. I tried it myself and agreed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I used the same Sanitaire for 20 years with only replacing the belts and one new cord in 20 years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D. Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Great household grade vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great household grade vacuum While this won't suck the fibers out of your carpets backing it will do a credible job of keeping them clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hyperjump

customer_reviews.title: Direct Vacuum, No Leaking
customer_reviews.text: The machine goes to work right now. No blow-back or leaking from around and on top. Then your carpet is clean. Very serious vacuum job.
customer_reviews.author: nvgrown

customer_reviews.title: Great for rugs
customer_reviews.text: This is one powerful vacuum. It fluffed up the nap on my old wall to wall. Just great. This is what you want if you have dogs and cats. I have had three Sanitaire vacs. Wore them out over the years. 1000 times better than any other vacuum. Its heavy. So it is hard to do stairs. Just great! 10 stars
customer_reviews.author: Charles Boulay

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my business. Definitely heavy duty with great cord length. Works ok but excessively loud. Cannot use in an occupied office without irritating office workers. Probably should use hearing protection for operator. Wish I had purchased something else.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K

customer_reviews.title: Powerful vaccum
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and delivery. Very powerful. Like it so much
customer_reviews.author: maymaiv

customer_reviews.title: It may suck up your pets too
customer_reviews.text: Watch out! It may suck up your pets too! Amazing suction, great on carpe, but do not use on rugs: it will pull on and ruin them
customer_reviews.author: astrobarby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the old Sanitaire model better but good ship.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased first vacuum for my office and decided to replace my home vacuum with same model. Love the extra long cord and this thing really sucks!
customer_reviews.author: S. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Already broke the bag holder and then the extension cord holder. Poor or to cheap manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: DR T

customer_reviews.title: ... in our furniture showrooms - we have 34 - love them!
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our furniture showrooms - we have 34 - love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill M.

customer_reviews.title: ***Poor quality!!! And worse customer service from VCDiscounter!!!
customer_reviews.text: ***BEWARE OF SELLER (VCDiscounter) **** Purchased this a vacuum a couple months ago and it gave us problems from the beginning until it totally broke a week ago! I've never known a vacuum to last for such a short time especially such an expensive one! On top of that the seller refuses to help in any way! Extremely poor service! I'm very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: joanne e.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time.  This is faulty and leaks dirt everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. Read other reviews. It leaks dirt and dust everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: lindapc007

customer_reviews.title: Better Than my Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: My brother recommended Sanitaire Commercial Vacs, but I had to get the fancy $550 Dyson. This vac sucks WAY better AND grooms the nap in my carpet so well I don't need to rake anymore. It takes me 1/3 of the time it used to take me to vac. THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wyngarden

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as our old Sanitaire's this is our 3rd it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as our old Sanitaire's this is our 3rd it breaks a lot of bells and has a lot of vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son. It performed exactly as is should have and always will!
customer_reviews.author: SewAmused

customer_reviews.title: Dependable good basic vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is basic and dependable - does a good job vacuuming carpet - every type I've used it on. I like the long cord and the dependable vacuuming. I've had this one for 1 1/2 years. I had my prior one for 35 years and vacuumed with it at least 4 times each week - all those years it worked great, just needing a new disposable bag when it was full, a new belt every now and then - and I replaced the brushes several times - I highly recommend this vacuum for keeping carpets vacuumed - with few problems.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected. It sucks!  Lol.
customer_reviews.text: This might be the grossest part but I love to see what my vacuum got up from my carpet. Quite a bit with a golden retriever. There’s no dog hair floating around my house!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Tired of cheap vacuums that didn't last. This one cleans and lifts carpet; leaves nice vacuumed lines. Nice long cord. Doesn't work good on hard floors. Doesn't have an edge cleaner but other than that, I love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and relatively easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Well made and relatively easy to assemble. Height settings make it perfect (and recommended) for wool loop-pile carpets. I recommend the #4 setting for most wool carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Lepper

customer_reviews.title: Great for carpets
customer_reviews.text: I now know why all the cleaning companies have this product. It cleans carpets wonderfully, but does not work on hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacum
customer_reviews.text: For as little as this vacuum cleaner is, it is strong and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Life Time Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great power!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older commercial version of this brand. I love the power of this vacuum and will put up with changing bags to keep up with my three large dogs and their constant shedding. It isn't quite as sturdy as my original vacuum, but let's face it, what product today is ever as sturdy as the one you replaced from 10 years ago?
customer_reviews.author: Terri Hoak

customer_reviews.title: Sanitaire SC888K Vacuum Bag Airway Seal Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The cloth bag airway flange attaches to the vacuum plastic body with 2 self tapping screws and a foam gasket. After assembly a high volume of air pushed by this faulty flange seal. This is an inexpensive poor design and will get worse over time due to handle movement and vibration. Sent vacuum back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: alan nicotera

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: dont look any further this vac will blow your mind the best one out there 6 stars best money i ever spent
customer_reviews.author: perrotta

product_meta.title: Sanitaire SC888K Commercial CRI Approved Upright Vacuum Cleaner with Disposal Bag and 7 Amp Motor, 12" Cleaning Path
product_meta.description: The innovative Sanitaire upright is UL listed and designed with the exclusive Quick Kleen feature that allows for easy access to the fan chamber. The 12-inch cleaning width, six level carpet adjustments and 50-foot power cord combined with the Vibra Groomer chrome steel brush roll, large easy-roll wheels and chrome steel hood help to extend the life of these machines, plus save time and money. A choice of extraordinary cleaning performance and long life! 7 Amps motor 145 CFM air Flow 12" cleaning width 6 position carpet height Micron filtration Dust bag style ST 6.1 dry qt dust capacity 44" cleaner height Chrome hood material Wide clear furniture guard will not leave color marks on baseboards Commercial grade 50 ft Power cord Ball bearing Vibra-Groomer II all-metal ball bearing brush roll with replaceable bristle strips QUICK KLEEN model, Removable, clear fan chamber lets you check at a glance to see if you need service. Specifications Power Amps: 7 Amp Watts: 840 CFM: 145 Filtration: Synthetic media filters 95% of allergens down to 0.3 microns Dust Capacity: 6.1 dry quart Containment Type: Easy access dual zipper bag Cleaning Path: 12" Cord Length: 50' quick showing Sound Level at the Operator: 79 dB. Additional Info Durable Design, Extended Motor Life Re-engineered motor includes integrated bearings and an enclosed carbon brush system. Motor life is more than double our previous long-life version. Easy-Access, Dual-Zipper 6.1 Qt Bag The dual-zipper bag case and easy -access clip make the dust bag easy to change. Quick Kleen Fan Chamber The clear-cover fan chamber lets you view, service or access the impeller fan without removing the motor, reducing maintenance time Save time and money with these long-lasting uprights that have large, easy roll wheels and a chrome hood cover With rugged construction and extra features, Sanitaire is the choice for exceptional cleaning performance.
feature_bullets: Sanitaire Commercial Upright Vacuum, High Efficiency 7A Long Life Motor, With Allergen Filtration & Arm & Hammer Odor Fighter, 12Cleaning Path, 50' Cord
